gemini.instruction: Review WO-083C-Spec.md and perform risk analysis. For each of the 5 target tests: 1) Identify God Class interaction risks (does the test rely on Household/Firm/Simulation internal state?), 2) Assess regression potential (likelihood of breaking during migration), 3) Check for circular dependency risks. Output a risk matrix with HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW ratings and mitigation strategies.

jules.instruction: PR Review feedback: REQUEST CHANGES. Critical issues found: 1) Zero-Sum violation risk - missing parent asset decrease verification after clone(), 2) Test coverage regression - stock inheritance test missing, 3) AI state verification weakened - Q-table content check removed. Please fix these issues. Read design/gemini_output/pr_review_verify-mitosis-migration-9067551690220486700.md for details.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check behavior logic and test coverage.
